short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects user to a GFG or LeetCode question whenever a page loads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 LeetCode GFG DSA Practice - Your Daily Dose of Coding Challenges! 🚀

Say goodbye to procrastination and hello to consistent DSA practice! With Smart DSA Redirector, each time you load a webpage, you'll be seamlessly redirected to a top coding challenge from GeeksforGeeks or LeetCode. Each challenge is unique—no repeats—ensuring you're always making progress towards mastering DSA. Perfect for students, developers, and coding enthusiasts!

🌟 Key Features
1. 🎯 Set Your Daily Goal
     Decide how many coding problems to tackle daily. Define your limit and stay on 
     track to achieve your goals!

2. 📜 Choose Your Practice Sheet
     Tailor your learning path by selecting from a variety of curated DSA sheets:

       💚 Love Babbar DSA Sheet
       🧡 Striver SDE Sheet
       💙 NeetCode 150 DSA Sheet
       💜 AlgoMap.io DSA Sheet
       💛 Leetcode Top Interview 150 Sheet
       🖤 Arsh DSA Sheet
     Focus on structured problem-solving and avoid randomness in your practice!

3. ✨ Enhanced User-Friendly Interface
     Experience a clean, modern, and responsive UI designed for effortless navigation 
     and control. Quickly adjust settings, select sheets, or change your goals—all in one 
     intuitive interface!

4. 🛑 Quick Disable Mode
     Need to research or pause your practice? Easily disable the extension with one click 
     for uninterrupted focus on other tasks.

5. 🏅 Level Up with Every Question
     Challenge yourself with high-quality DSA problems daily. Consistent practice leads 
     to measurable skill improvement—start building your coding expertise today!

6. 📈 Track Your Progress
    Take your practice to the next level by enabling analysis in the extension! Visit 
    thinkdsa.com to track your journey:

    Head to the Analysis tab.
    Authenticate your account.
    Access detailed insights and metrics about your progress.
    Keep track of your achievements, analyze weak areas, and celebrate milestones—all 
    from a centralized dashboard!

Why wait? Start coding smarter and more effectively with Smart DSA Redirector. Your journey to cracking coding interviews and mastering algorithms starts now! 🌟
